readable.title: 3428386573_670f5362f0
readable.content: A male tennis player standing on a tennis court swings his tennis racket at the tennis ball . A man plays tennis . A man wearing white turns to hit a yellow tennis ball . A tennis player focuses on the ball as he prepares to hit it , while a cameraman stands in the background next to a La Quinta advertising logo . The tennis player holds his racket up anticipating the ball .
